data.title: Unlocking Global Opportunities
data.meta_description: On July 31, 2024, NAR held a virtual webinar that provided findings from the 2024 International Transactions in U.S. Residential Real Estate report, and discussed how REALTORSÂ® are unlocking global opportunities in the residential real estate market.
